public class ParticleSystemsAction
extends BasicGameAction

Particle system action, an action to update any particle system made with pedrigree.

Author:
Tiago "Spiegel" Costa

Method Detail

update

public void update(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
                   org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame sbg,
                   int delta)
Description copied from interface: IGameActionObject
The update method of the action, this is where the action shall perform its function. This is exactly the same method signature that can be found in Slick2d update method. Usually this method is called by the action manager, and not directly by the user.

Parameters:
gc - the game container
sbg - the state base game (null if no slick states are used)
delta - the time in milliseconds since the last update
